Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.EXPLANATION: The percentage reduction in waste generated during production processes.
Efficiency of the value stream mapping process in identifying and eliminating waste.
The rate at which inventory is sold and replaced over a specific period.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.FORMULA: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.EXPLANATION: The decrease in the time from the start of a process to its completion.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.FORMULA: (Initial Lead Time - Final Lead Time) / Initial Lead Time * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.EXPLANATION: The level of employee involvement and participation in lean practices.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.FORMULA: (Number of Employees Participating in Lean Practices / Total Employees) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.EXPLANATION: The financial savings achieved through the implementation of lean practices.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.FORMULA: Total Cost Savings from Lean Initiatives

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.EXPLANATION: The decrease in the time it takes to complete one cycle of a production process.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.FORMULA: (Initial Cycle Time - Final Cycle Time) / Initial Cycle Time * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Lean Manufac.EXPLANATION: The effectiveness of 5S practices (Sort, Set in order, Shine, Standardize, Sustain).
